channel.title: crashing, crashing, and more crashing
channel.description: I installed updates for my OS (Windows 7) and now whenever I use firefox it crashes within minutes of my using it. Not only that, but if I manage to get to sites like youtube without crashing I'm not able to view videos mostly because adobe will crash or if it does not I am simply not able to play the video. Basically, what should have been beneficial for my system is now fucking me over. What to do?

item.title: crashing, crashing, and more crashing

item.description:
Restarts fix lots of windows problems

item.description:
I simply restarted my computer and the problem was solved, now I feel like more of a retard, but still it was solved.

Read full topic

item.title: crashing, crashing, and more crashing

item.description:
A friend of mine had the same problem and he said that reinstalling Firefox solved the issue, try doing that.
